tradestock.model.portfolio

Interface IPortfolio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Portfolio

    public interface IPortfolio
    This interface represent a IPortfolio. A portfolio of stocks is simply a collection of stocks (e.g. 10 shares of company X, 10 shares of company Y, etc.). A portfolio object could get portfolio name, get total stocks number, get stocks number at certain date, get stocks cost, get stocks cost at certain date, get total value of stocks, get total value at certain date, add a transaction record, and get portfolio state as string.

    • Method Detail

      • getPortfolioName

        java.lang.String getPortfolioName()
        Return the name of portfolio.
        Returns:
        the name of portfolio

      • setAPI

        void setAPI(IGetPrice api)
        Set API object used in portfolio. A API object must implements IGetPrice interface.
        Parameters:
        api - api object

      • getStockNumber

        double getStockNumber()
        Return total stocks number at present.
        Returns:
        total stocks number at present

      • getStockNumberByDate

        double getStockNumberByDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return total stocks number at certain date. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        date - given date to get stocks number
        Returns:
        total stocks number at certain date

      • getStockCost

        double getStockCost(double commissionFee)
        Return total stocks cost at present. If commission fee is negative, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        commissionFee - commission fee
        Returns:
        total stocks cost at present

      • getStockCostByDate

        double getStockCostByDate(java.time.LocalDate date,
                          double commissionFee)
        Return total stocks cost at certain date. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. If commission fee is negative, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        date - given date to get stocks cost
        commissionFee - commission fee
        Returns:
        total stocks cost at certain date

      • getValue

        double getValue()
        Return total stocks value at present.
        Returns:
        total stocks value at present

      • getValueByDate

        double getValueByDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Return total stocks value at certain date. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        date - given date to get stocks value
        Returns:
        total stocks value at certain date

      • addTransaction

        void addTransaction(java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                    java.time.LocalDate date,
                    boolean isSell,
                    double number)
        Add a transaction history of stocks in this portfolio. If stock symbol is null or empty string, or date is null, or number is not positive. When selling stocks, if number of stocks is bigger than current stock number, this method will throw IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - given stock symbol to add transaction record
        date - given date of transaction
        isSell - true if sell, or false if buy
        number - number of stocks to operate

      • addTransaction

        void addTransaction(java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                    java.time.LocalDate date,
                    boolean isSell,
                    double number,
                    double cost)
        Add a transaction history of stocks in this portfolio. If stock symbol is null or empty string, or date is null, or number is not positive. When selling stocks, if number of stocks is bigger than current stock number, this method will throw IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - given stock symbol to add transaction record
        date - given date of transaction
        isSell - true if sell, or false if buy
        number - number of stocks to operate
        cost - cost of stock

      • getPortfolioState

        java.util.List<IStock> getPortfolioState()
        Return portfolio state as List of IStock at present.
        Returns:
        portfolio state at present

        Return portfolio state as List at certain date. Transactions after given date will not affect the result. If date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        date - given date to get portfolio state
        Returns:
        portfolio state at certain date

      • savePortfolio

        Save this portfolio as a XML file.
        Parameters:
